If you're interested in a modern take on classic villains, "Maleficent" (2014) starring Angelina Jolie is a captivating story about a vengeful fairy seeking revenge on a helpless princess. And if you're interested in a dark and gritty crime thriller, "Downfall" (2004) starring Juliane Köhler is a compelling story about a drug-fueled descent into darkness.
